itemListElement.name: Black Eyed Pea and Sweet Potato Hash

@graph.name: Black Eyed Peas and Sweet Potato Hash
@graph.description: Bring in the new year with this plentiful 1 Pot Black eyed pea and Sweet Potato Hash with Harissa Spice. Ready in 20 minutes. Serve over toast with a creamy dressing or avocado. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1  sweet potato (peeled and cubed small (1.5 to 2 cups cubed))
1/2 tsp or more salt (depends on if the black eyed peas are salted)
1 tsp harissa spice blend  (or 2 to 3 tsp paste)
1.5 cup or more chopped baby greens (I use 1 cup chopped frozen baby spinach)
ground cumin (black pepper, or more harissa spice blend for garnish)
cilantro/scallions and lemon juice for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat, Add onion and garlic and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent. 5 to 6 minutes. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat, Add onion and garlic and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent. 5 to 6 minutes. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sweet potato, bell pepper, 1/4 tsp salt, thyme, harissa and toss well to coat. Cover and cook for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sweet potato, bell pepper, 1/4 tsp salt, thyme, harissa and toss well to coat. Cover and cook for 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a splash of water (2 to 3 tbsp) and mix. Cover and cook for 8 to 10 minutes undisturbed. Stir and check if the sweet potatoes are done. Cover and cook for 2 minutes or so longer if not done.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a splash of water (2 to 3 tbsp) and mix. Cover and cook for 8 to 10 minutes undisturbed. Stir and check if the sweet potatoes are done. Cover and cook for 2 minutes or so longer if not done.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the black eyed peas and greens and mix well. Increase heat to medium high and cook for 2 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and heat. Add a tsp of olive oil or vegan butter, cumin, black pepper or more harissa spice blend, a dash of lemon and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the black eyed peas and greens and mix well. Increase heat to medium high and cook for 2 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and heat. Add a tsp of olive oil or vegan butter, cumin, black pepper or more harissa spice blend, a dash of lemon and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Take off heat. Garnish with cilantro and serve as is or with garlic bread or over toasted bread or tortillas. Or make a bowl with cooked grains, lettuce/greens and a dressing.
